summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FocusFlow dark mode toggle and Google OAuth integration UI features. All new functionality working perfectly including dark mode persistence, Google integration dialogs, and proper error handling for unconfigured OAuth.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/auth/google/login returns proper 400 error when OAuth not configured
Backend: GET /api/settings includes dark_mode and google_calendar_connected fields
Backend: PUT /api/settings successfully updates dark_mode setting
Backend: Health endpoint shows google_configured: false as expected
Frontend: Dark mode toggle button present in header with proper data-testid
Frontend: Dark mode toggle applies 'dark' CSS class to HTML element
Frontend: Dark mode toggle removes 'dark' class when toggled back to light
Frontend: Google Integration button present in header with proper styling
Frontend: Google Integration dialog opens from header button
Frontend: Google Integration dialog shows 'Not Connected' status correctly
Frontend: Google Integration dialog shows 'Connect Google' button
Frontend: Connect Google button triggers proper error toast notification
Frontend: Settings dialog opens and displays all sections correctly
Frontend: Settings dialog contains dark mode toggle switch
Frontend: Settings dialog contains Google Account integration section
Frontend: Settings dialog shows Google integration status badge as 'Connect'
Frontend: Dark mode toggle in settings works and persists after save
Frontend: Google Account section in settings opens Google Integration dialog
Frontend: Toast notification system displays OAuth error message correctly
Mobile: Responsive design works properly on 390px width
Mobile: Mobile menu button expands/collapses correctly
Mobile: Settings accessible from mobile header
Mobile: Google Integration accessible from mobile bottom action bar
Mobile: Google Integration dialog displays properly on mobile
Mobile: Toast notifications work on mobile devices

success_percentage.backend: 100% (25/25 tests passed including new Google OAuth and dark mode endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all dark mode and Google integration UI features working)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (seamless dark mode persistence and Google OAuth error handling)
